name: TBATBS
description:
Even compared to my other stuff on here, this one's rough. Primarily a C# practice piece, this game is an "Advance Wars"-esque turn based strategy with basic map generation and AI opponents. The sprite art is by me (which explains a lot) and there are absolutely no frills whatsoever. Download at your own risk.

Controls:
Left click - selects/instructs units and buildings, navigates UI
WASD - Pans camera
